<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

<a name="module_ProductDBRecording"></a>

The ProductDBRecording module represents the state of the current recording, and allows
to start/stop recordings and check if there's a recording in progress.


* [ProductDBRecording](#module_ProductDBRecording)
    * [.start()](#module_ProductDBRecording+start)
    * [.stop()](#module_ProductDBRecording+stop)
    * [.pause()](#module_ProductDBRecording+pause)
    * [.resume()](#module_ProductDBRecording+resume)

<a name="module_ProductDBRecording+start"></a>

### recording.start()
Starts recording the meeting.

<a name="module_ProductDBRecording+stop"></a>

### recording.stop()
Stops all recording currently in 'RECORDING' state

<a name="module_ProductDBRecording+pause"></a>

### recording.pause()
Pauses all recording currently in 'RECORDING' state

<a name="module_ProductDBRecording+resume"></a>

### recording.resume()
Resumes all recording currently in 'PAUSED' state
